subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Dirk Nowitzki led Dallas with 29 points, but it was Jason Terry’s late 3-point shooting and playmaking that lifted the Mavericks to victory in Game 5 of the N.B.A. finals.
snippet: Dirk Nowitzki led Dallas with 29 points, but it was Jason Terry’s late 3-point shooting and playmaking that lifted the Mavericks to victory in Game 5 of the N.B.A. finals.
